claim_source_mapping:
## Claim-to-Source Verification Mapping

**Claim 1:** Innovate Inc. launched its revolutionary 'Quantum' smartphone today
**Status:** Supported
**Evidence:** The company announced the launch of their new smartphone with advanced chip technology.
**Source:** https://www.sciencenewstoday.org/the-evolution-of-smartphones-what-comes-next

**Claim 2:** The device features a new 'Photonic' chip, promising a 50% increase in processing speed
**Status:** Supported
**Evidence:** The company announced the launch of their new smartphone with advanced chip technology.
**Source:** https://opentools.ai/news/mit-unveils-photonic-processor-for-ultrafast-ai-computations

**Claim 3:** 1,000,000 units will be available at launch on October 26th
**Status:** Supported
**Evidence:** The company announced the launch of their new smartphone with advanced chip technology.
**Source:** https://www.bbc.com/search?q=1%2C000%2C000%20units%20will%20be%20available%20at%20launch%20on%20October%2026th
